price: Lau kuwa hawa ni miungu, wasingeli ingia. Na wote watadumu humo.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: Lau kama hawa mlio waabudu badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu ni miungu inayo stahiki kuabudiwa, wasingeli ingia nanyi humo. Na nyote, wenye kuabudu na kuabudiwa, mtabaki Motoni, wala hamtatoka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
